reviewText: I watched this dvd and then threw it in the trash.  You get what you pay for. Showed the same girls over and over.  Lots of nudity and girl on girl action but nothing exciting.

This "Wild Party Girls" DVD is quite a good one. It's the typical scenario of girls flashing either in dance clubs or on the street, probably either in New Orleans or Key West. This is overwhelmingly T & A shots, with a slight bit of total nudity. LOTS of topless shots! A little bit of girl-girl but it stays quite tame. And the producers get a LOT of mileage out of 2 knock-out girls who appear repeatedly and are usually shown together, including at some kind of stripper contest at the end. One of them really seems like a stripper and has SURE got the chest for it!! Some of the "Wild Party Girls" DVDs have too much image manipulation - discoloration, multiple images, etc. - but this one just does that a little bit. Still, that contributes to wasted time, including too many "booty shaking" shots. I like some booty shaking too, but it goes on a bit too much here for my taste. Picture quality is quite good, sometimes widescreen and sometimes full screen, and it's edited well. Run time of the DVD is about 58 minutes, with a bonus of a decent 3.5-minute slide show. So, overall it's a pretty good DVD, but some better "Wild Party Girls" DVDs are Wild Party Girls: Naked Spring Break and also Wild Party Girls: Naked Boat Bash, and last but not least Wild Party Girls: Summer Madness Tour.
